name: Rusk
appearance: Square-jawed, salt-grimed, with a scar across the bridge of his nose; wears a tool bandolier and bone-splint armguard.
character: Stoic foreman who loves machines more than meetings; loyal to crews, wary of priests and patrons both.
talents: fixes anything with rope and bone
catnaps to the tick of gears
dreams: Win an autonomy charter for his crew
Build an arch that sings true in high wind
Retire before the Long Note ever sounds
secrets: Sells maintenance windows to Verrin Nasse for coin
Hid a copy of the bypass map in a lantern cistern
Kicked out a temple survey stake to stall the Shellspire terrace
